title: labor_walking_to_village_for_food_supply
summary: Observation of a laborer walking from the farm to the village to purchase food.
description: This data unit records a labor activity in which a worker walks from MaMeeFarm to the nearby village to purchase food supplies. The round-trip walking distance is approximately 3 kilometers. No motorized transportation is available at this location.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
